arm_group.description: Diagnosed as CML with chronic phase
Diagnosed as CML with accelerated phase
Diagnosed as CML with blast crisis
Diagnosed as CML, which is not included in any of other category

biospec_descr.textblock:
Bone marrow aspirate or peripheral blood (for its mononuclear cells) will be collected,
      processed, and cryopreserved for future analysis of DNA or cell culture. Acquisition of
      biospecimens will be proceeded if patient agree with the informed consent for donation of
      biospecimen to 'Asan Medical Center Biomaterial Resource Banking Center'. This registry data
      will be used as a basic demographic and clinical information for the biospecimens.

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators would like to propose a prospective longitudinal observational cohort
      study for patients who will be diagnosed and/or treated for chronic myeloid leukemia at Asan
      Medical Center, Seoul, Korea, to use the acquired data for fundamentals of other
      retrospective analysis.

clinical_study.brief_title: Chronic Myelod Leukemia Registry at Asan Medical Center

detailed_description.textblock:
1. Acquisition of informed concent form

        2. Data acquisition from medical record including

             -  demographic / disease-associated factors

             -  details of treatment, and its results

             -  complications during treatment

             -  genetic data

             -  survival outcome (upto 30 years)

        3. Accumulation of data for 30 years

        4. Use of data for other retrospective analysis (including Asan Medical center Cell
           Banking basic data)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All patients who are diagnosed and/or treated as chronic myeloid leukemia at Asan
             Medical Center

          -  15 years of age and over

          -  All patients who give written consent according to guidelines at Asan Medical Center
             committee on human research

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients who refuse to give consent to registering

study_pop.textblock:
Patients who are diagnosed and/or treated with chronic myeloid leukemia at Asan Medical
        Center, Seoul, Korea

intervention.description: All patients who will be enrolled in this prospective registry are confined to those who are diagnosed as chronic myeloid leukemia at Asan Medical Center, Seoul, Korea, from Jan 2013 till Dec 2047

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Observational Cohort Registry for Patients With Chronic Myeloid Leukemia at Asan Medical Center

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Definition of events will be as 'failure', 'progress to AP/BC', 'intolerant and medication change', and 'death from any cause'.
Failure will be defined as BCR-ABL elevation at 2 serial times, progression to AP/BC, loss of hematologic / cytogenetic response, any appearance of ABL kinase mutation, and clonal evolution.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
